data.title: Oil prices drop as rising U.S. coronavirus cases stoke fears of weak fuel demand
data.text: Oil prices fell on Monday, with U.S. oil dropping more than 2%, as a spike in new coronavirus cases in the United States raised concerns over a second wave of the virus which would weigh on the pace of fuel demand recovery.

data.title: Wall Street ends higher but indexes mark worst week since March selloff
data.text: U.S. stocks ended higher on Friday as bargain hunters stepped back into the market following sharp losses a day earlier, but all three major indexes suffered their biggest weekly percentage declines since March.
